title: PCRSimPlot
text: PCRSimPlot package provides functions simulate plot PCR (Polymerase Chain Reaction) data. vignette demonstrates use simulate_pcr() plot_pcr() functions generate visualize PCR data.

title: PCRSimPlot
text: Use simulate_pcr() function generate simulated PCR data. function requires initial DNA concentration (N0), amplification efficiency (E), optional fluorescence threshold. simulate_pcr() function returns list two components: pcr_data (data frame simulated PCR data) Ct (cycle threshold value).

title: PCRSimPlot
text: Use plot_pcr() function visualize simulated PCR data. function creates ggplot object showing fluorescence cycles, vertical line indicating cycle threshold (Ct).

title: PCRSimPlot
text: PCRSimPlot package provides easy way simulate visualize PCR data. Use provided functions gain insights PCR dynamics results.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Atta Lowe. Author, maintainer.

title: PCR Simulation and Plotting
text: PCRSimPlot R package simulating plotting PCR (Polymerase Chain Reaction) data. includes functions generating PCR data specified parameters visualizing results.

title: PCR Simulation and Plotting
text: can install development version PCRSimPlot GitHub.

title: PCR Simulation and Plotting
text: simulate_pcr(): simulates PCR data based initial DNA concentration (N0), amplification efficiency (E), fluorescence threshold (threshold). function returns list two elements: pcr_data: data frame containing simulated PCR data columns Cycle, DNA, Fluorescence. Ct: cycle threshold (Ct) value fluorescence exceeds threshold.

title: PCR Simulation and Plotting
text: plot_pcr() Plots simulated PCR data, showing fluorescence cycles cycle threshold (Ct). # Usage Arguments: pcr_data: data frame containing PCR data (typically simulate_pcr()). Ct: cycle threshold (Ct) value. Returns: ggplot object visualizing PCR data line plot fluorescence cycles, including vertical line indicating Ct valu

title: PCR Simulation and Plotting
text: basic example shows solve common problem:
code: result <- simulate_pcr(N0 = 10, E = 1.8) plot <- plot_pcr(result$pcr_data, result$Ct) print(plot)

title: Plot PCR Data — plot_pcr
text: function plots PCR fluorescence data cycle threshold.

title: Plot PCR Data — plot_pcr
text: pcr_data data frame PCR data (output simulate_pcr). Ct cycle threshold value (output simulate_pcr).

title: Sample PCR Data — sample_data
text: data frame containing simulated PCR data.

title: Sample PCR Data — sample_data
text: data frame 40 rows 2 columns: Cycle integer indicating PCR cycle number. DNA numeric value representing DNA concentration. Fluorescence numeric value representing fluorescence measurement.

title: Sample PCR Data — sample_data
text: Simulated data demonstration purposes.

title: Simulate PCR Data — simulate_pcr
text: function simulates PCR fluorescence data based initial DNA amount, efficiency, threshold value.

title: Simulate PCR Data — simulate_pcr
text: N0 Initial amount DNA. E Efficiency PCR process. threshold Threshold value detecting cycle.

title: Simulate PCR Data — simulate_pcr
text: list two elements: pcr_data (data frame) Ct (cycle threshold).
